basic.description: This course covers selected topics in meteorology and climatology not covered in other courses. May be repeated as content changes to a maximum of twelve semester hours.
basic.subject: MET
basic.title: Selected Topics in Meteorology

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MET 2700 with a grade of "C" or better. Corequisites: MET 2101, MET 3300, and instructor permission.
